text: Cotia is an Brazilian city in the state of São Paulo. In 2020, 253,608 people lived here. Its area is 324 km². The elevation is 853 m. Cotia was founded in 1580 and was an active village during the "bandeiras" expeditions. It became a city since April 2, 1856. Category:Cities in São Paulo (state)
title: Cotia
